text: Park Service removes slavery exhibit at Independence Park in Philadelphia - The Washington Post
fullText: Park staff dismantled an exhibit about George Washington’s slave ownership amid a wider push to remove information on racism, sexism and climate change.

text: Asian Stocks to Gain After US Data, BOJ in Focus: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
fullText: Asian stocks climbed to a record and the dollar held its losses as global investors favored non-US assets amid policy unpredictability and geopolitical risks. Precious metals also set new all-time highs.

text: Video Shows Comedian Corey Holcomb Punch Female Comic in the Face - TMZ
fullText: There's nothing funny about what comedian Corey Holcomb appears to do in this video ... socking a woman right in the face, igniting a Hollywood street brawl.

text: Live updates: Vance blames Minnesota officials for ICE presence but concedes misconduct should be investigated - CNN

text: Contractor indicted over alleged leaks to Washington Post - Politico

text: Trump sues JPMorgan, Jamie Dimon over cutting off banking access - The Washington Post
fullText: President Donald Trump filed suit against JPMorgan Chase and its CEO, Jamie Dimon, saying the bank abruptly closed his accounts.

text: House Republicans barely defeat Venezuela war powers resolution to check Trump’s military actions - AP News
fullText: The House has barely rejected a Democratic-backed resolution that would have prevented President Donald Trump from sending U.S. military forces to Venezuela. A tied vote on the legislation fell just short of the majority needed for passage. Democrats forced t…

text: Hall of Famer Carlos Beltran: Not defined by Astros scandal - ESPN
fullText: Carlos Beltrán was the only player mentioned by name in the 2017 Astros' sign-stealing scandal, but the Hall of Famer said it doesn't define who he is.

text: Weather update: Friday classes canceled - news.wisc.edu
fullText: In response to the extreme cold, UW–Madison is canceling classes on Friday, January 23.

text: Elon Musk’s Fortune Hits Record $788 Billion As Tesla Spikes 4% - Forbes

text: Heart disease deaths declined. And here's how to reduce your risk of the #1 killer - NPR
